title: Interpretation of seeing a massacre in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a massacre in a dream in detail is one of the interpretations followed by many jurists and scholars. Slaughter can be within the circle of good and benign signs for the fortuneteller, and it can be the opposite, and to know that you must follow this article that will take in the series. To clarify all the clues whether she is single, married or male. Follow us for more. Interpretation of seeing a massacre in a dream in detail. When we hear the word slaughter at first glance, we think it is the slaughter of a sheep, but the word slaughter is followed by many things that a person can dream of in his dream. In the book Ta’tir al-Anam by al-Nabulsi, it was mentioned that slaughter in general in a dream is evidence of... Injustice and hateful things in him. It may appear that he disobeyed his parents or that he lies and accuses others of many incorrect things. He also said that slaughtering animals indicates falling into the sin that the dreamer is tempted by. Unless those animals are of the type that God has permitted us to slaughter and eat, then they are It is a good sign for the pioneer, and they give him good tidings of kindness and justice, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees that a person is slaughtering, the interpretations differ, and if the slaughter is for a merchant, then it is a sign of sustenance and money. Interpretation of slaughter in a dream for a single woman. Others dealt with different interpretations of Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, and it was said that the single woman who Witnessing an animal being slaughtered in front of her is good news and success for her, and God knows best. It could indicate a person’s engagement or marriage. While the person slaughtered in front of her was someone she knows, here we conclude from the dream that the same person is going through crises and problems and needs help. And if she is ignorant of them, then the problems in her life are the same, by God. I know.Interpretation of seeing a massacre in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing slaughter in a married woman’s dream. Among the interpretations given to a dream of slaughter for a married woman is that if she sees that she is slaughtering a bird and remembers that the word of God is greater, then it is a dream that indicates the goodness that prevails in her home. And her life. But if one of the animals that God did not mention was slaughtered for food, then the dream here is interpreted as a warning against her actions, because they anger God Almighty and harm them with evil and harm. It is said that she slaughtered one of her sons in the dream, which is evidence of his high status in God Almighty and that he attains the love of people. Those around him. It also foretells his great future when he grows up, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a massacre in a divorced woman’s dream: Sometimes a divorced woman dreams that she is slaughtering her ex-husband, and this dream is a sign that she wronged him and was quick to make her decisions. And if she slaughters an animal that God allows him to eat, then this is a sign that she has wronged him and was quick to make her decisions. On the relief that will come to his life. And that her life will change for the better, God willing. Interpretation of seeing slaughter in a dream for a man. What was the interpretation of the massacre in the man’s dream? Let's take a look at these clues below: A man slaughtering a calf in his dream is a good and praiseworthy sign, and an indication of abundant blessings and good things for him and his family. It was said that his dream was slaughtering one of his sons, then he was overcome with sadness and remorse for what he had done. It is one of the dreams that comes as a result of anxiety. The dreamer and his fear for the son’s future, which indicates the success and superiority of this son

title: Interpretation of a cake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article we look at the interpretation of cakes in a dream and their meaning in different situations. The cakes coincide with the occasion of Eid al-Fitr, which represents the main dessert that Muslims eat on this occasion. It is also one of the sweets that is preferred to be presented to guests for its good taste, but on the other hand, it is among the visions of mysterious things for the dreamer, which can sometimes indicate that something happy will happen to the dreamer because cakes are actually associated with happy events, but there are many different interpretations given by interpreters. Dreams like Ibn Sirin about this vision, which you will find in the encyclopedia. Cake in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing cakes in a dream The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing cakes in a dream is generally a sign of kindness, blessing, and livelihood, and it may mean that you will get some money. If the dreamer sees that he is eating Cake, this vision indicates that he will get a lot of money in the near future, and God knows best, if the dreamer finds that the taste was good. In the case of eating a lot of cake, this vision shows how much the dreamer lacks moral support, love and attention. Seeing holiday cakes indicates To good relationships in the life of the dreamer. One of the symbols of seeing cakes in a dream is that it indicates an opportunity to travel, and God knows best, and it is also an indication of the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys in reality. If the dreamer sees a cake and cannot eat it in a dream, then this vision is repulsive and expresses The problems and sorrow that she experiences in reality. Seeing cakes in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cakes in a dream for an unmarried woman is a promising vision for achieving what she wants in reality. It is also an indication of her imminent marriage, and God knows best. It is one of the visions that express goodness, happiness, and diet for her. Freedom. Seeing cakes in an unmarried woman’s dream means success and excellence, whether in study or at work. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is baking cakes in a dream, this vision indicates the coming of comfort and happiness and the removal of worries and sorrows from her. In the case of dreaming of buying cakes, this The vision indicates good luck and abundant sustenance for him. Cakes in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this vision for a married woman, if she sees that her husband offers her a plate containing many cakes, then this vision indicates the coming of comfort and the death of worry and worry. If a married woman dreams By baking a cake, this vision indicates that she is going through some changes in her life that indicate goodness and happiness for her. Seeing a married woman eating a cake in a dream indicates the end of the problems that worry her in the dream, so it is a vision that expresses goodness and happiness for her. Interpretation of a dream about cake for a pregnant woman if she sees If a pregnant woman dreams that she is baking cake in a dream, then this vision indicates goodness and happiness in reality. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is baking cakes, this is a sign that she and her child will enjoy health and well-being. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing cakes in a dream, and at the end of this article it should be noted That taught

title: Interpretation of a dream about a vagina: seeing a vagina in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the vagina in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, and the touch of a clean white vagina, or with a naked woman’s hair, and a dream of a woman’s nudity. A woman or a man from Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, and more interpretations in the appendix of the topic below: The vulva in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the vulva in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams that we see in our dreams and causes us great embarrassment, especially in the case of wanting to get the correct interpretation as possible as seeing the vulva. In a dream, there are many different images and shapes that we will show you to get the correct and correct interpretation of the dream and to know the sign that the dreamer carries. Interpretation of seeing a trick in a dream. To see the Gulf in general in a dream is to remove sadness and comfort for the world, and it is a single marriage, or a trip for someone who needs to travel and reveal secrets to whom. Looking for something confusing or ambiguous, as well as a company or joint project agreement. Seeing a woman’s genitals and a girl’s genitals in a dream indicates the disappearance of distress and anguish and the arrival of comfort and prosperity. A woman who sees her private parts in a dream and sees that water has entered her vagina, then her vision indicates that she will give birth to a child and an imminent pregnancy. God willing. If a woman or girl sees in a dream that her vagina is made of metal or iron, then this vision shows the difficulty of the road and the disappointment that befalls her, which prevents her from achieving her goals and fulfilling her desires and goals. For a man who sees a woman’s private parts and vagina in his dream, his vision indicates the upcoming vagina, God willing. Whoever sees that he is touching or holding the private parts of a woman or a girl, and feels that he is hard as iron, then seeing this man shows some of the things that he demands from his wife who does not fulfill him. Requirements: Whoever dreams that he is touching his wife’s private parts and her vagina will be happy. If the woman’s private parts and private parts are small, he will defeat his enemy, and if he is large, his enemy will defeat him. Whoever dreams that he is looking at a woman’s or girl’s private parts with a look of lust, then he will engage in a reprehensible or suspicious act. Whoever sees in His dream is that he is sucking the vagina of a woman or girl in his dream, so his vision shows the possible vagina, but in a weak percentage. If the girl is unmarried and unmarried, then seeing her vagina in a dream means that she will get married, and seeing her vagina made of iron, then she will also marry something that she does not like or is afraid of. Its occurrence in her life. If a married woman sees her vagina in a dream as if water is entering, then she will give birth to a baby or a new boy, and if she sees that it is iron or zero, then this is undesirable, this may mean that she will. Never give birth or show despair for something he wants in this world. A pregnant woman sees in her vagina that she will give birth to a boy, and if she sees that her vagina is iron or yellow, she may fear that her son will fall from her stomach before he grows up. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of seeing the Gulf: It is in a dream a relief for someone He is in distress, marrying a single man and heading on a trip, and being assigned to company and revealing secrets, and the gulf refers to the prison or the door of the house that God Almighty commanded him to come to. God Almighty said: {And they entered the houses from their doors} and the difference is the mihrab and the qiblah.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a donkey by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about riding a donkey, and interpretation of a dream about a donkey that bit me

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a donkey: The donkey is one of the animals that God has subjected to man. It is a very patient and serious animal, but the sound of its braying is considered one of the sounds that disgusts man, as God Almighty said in His book: Among the sounds is the sound of donkeys. Thus, the sound in a dream indicates an unwanted association, but seeing it in a dream varies depending on the dreamer’s condition and color. Interpretation of a dream about a donkey by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about a donkey? Seeing a donkey in a dream is interpreted as many problems, hardships, and fears that surround the dreamer. If A person sees in his dream that he is riding a donkey, this means that he will be able to overcome all his worries and sorrows that he suffered from. As for seeing a donkey braying in a dream, this indicates sadness and anxiety that befalls the dreamer. For the bewitched person, when he sees a donkey in a dream, this symbolizes That he will be freed from magic, as the donkey is a sign of removing all restrictions and ties in the dreamer's life, and the dream also shows that he will find it. A solution to all his problems that he could not find a solution to before. Hearing the sound of a donkey in a dream means that the dreamer will hear sad news in the coming days. What is the interpretation of a dream about a donkey by Ibn Sirin? When a traveler sees a donkey in his dream, this is a sign of kindness and livelihood that he will receive, But slowly after making a great effort, this vision is also a sign of the great responsibilities that fall on the dreamer. A dream about a donkey may indicate a good wife or a good son for the dreamer. If one dreams that he is afraid of a donkey and its presence, then this dream indicates that he is a deceitful and hypocritical person. Kicking a donkey in a dream means that the person with knowledge will hear a lot of unpleasant news in the coming period. Whoever sees in his dream that he is carrying a donkey, this symbolizes that he will gain a lot of knowledge. Seeing a donkey in a dream in a different form than usual indicates his shortcomings towards His Lord. The unit includes Interpretation of dreams on an Egyptian website. From Google, there are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Interpretation of a dream about a donkey for a single woman. A donkey in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will marry a serious and patient man who will take on many responsibilities. The dream also indicates that she will achieve Many of her planned goals and desires. If she dreams of a black donkey, this symbolizes that she will gain influence and status and will enjoy days full of happiness. Interpretation of a dream about riding a donkey for a single woman: An unmarried woman riding a donkey in a dream generally indicates that she will get married soon and will find a prestigious job and occupy a high position, Her financial and living condition will improve and her psychological state will change for the better. When an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream riding a wild donkey, this means that she is committing many sins and transgressions and must return to God. If you see her riding on the back of a fat donkey, this indicates that she will marry a man. A rich man has a high status. Interpretation of a dream about a white donkey for a single woman: A white donkey in one dream indicates that she will marry a religious person who fears God, while a white donkey

title: 50 accurate interpretations by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi of seeing a mother in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream? Seeing a mother in a dream is one of the visions that symbolizes safety, affection, and good feelings. Once he sees her in a dream, he feels divine an atmosphere of peace, love and tranquility. Seeing one’s mother is one of the visions in which jurists differ in interpretation, because the situation in which the dreamer sees his mother can suggest different meanings. The mother may be sick, traveling or sitting in her place, then we find various visions, and what generally concerns us is the interpretation of seeing the mother in a dream. Mental vision. He always follows his intuition, which he considers his loyal guide. Seeing a mother indicates passion colored by love, tenderness, and constant giving without exchange. The vision indicates pure love that is not tainted by any common interest or benefit behind it. It is love for the sake of love and nothing else. The mother indicates in A dream refers to the house in which a person lives or the land on which he walks. Seeing her in the house is a sign of the blessing of life, abundance of sustenance, and countless good things. Seeing her symbolizes divine providence, repeated supplications, and immunization against every danger. Seeing a mother’s arms in a dream Refers to a task, receiving a task, or receiving a message from the mother and acting on it. The work he did. The mother symbolizes the life that the fortuneteller will accept. If he is kind to his mother and listens to her advice and responds to her orders, then this indicates a simple life that can be managed easily and free of obstacles or problems, but if he stays away from his mother and does not focus on her, then this is an indication of The difficulties he faces in his life and the feeling of fatigue and misery that accompany him throughout his life. And if he sees his mother kissing him in a dream, this indicates reproach, guidance, and benefit in this world and the afterlife. Seeing the mother sad or angry is evidence of the priest leaving her, disobeying her, disobeying her, her decisions, and abandoning her. The vision of a mother is the refuge to which the Lord resorts in his joy and sadness, and it is the path through which he reveals the secrets of his heart. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin This vision is one of the visions that Ibn Sirin did not mention in all of his books. What we find are just fragments or scattered and scattered information about the meaning of this vision, and we can conclude from these scattered parts the following: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a mother is a sign of kindness, ease, success, passing difficult experiences, and solving complex problems. Seeing a mother indicates the need for divine focus He is completely devoted to his mother, taking care of her, supervising her affairs, and meeting her needs. A mother’s smile in a dream is good news for the dreamer to accept invitations, improve the situation, reach the goal and change the scales. In distress. The vision is undesirable, or it spreads bad news to the monarch. If he sees that his mother is giving birth to him as if she is afflicted with a disease, this indicates the approach of menstruation and the end of life. Ibn Sirin confirms by saying that seeing the mother angry or unwilling to see the fortuneteller in the dream.

What we find are just fragments or scattered and scattered information about the meaning of this vision, and we can conclude from these scattered parts the following: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a mother is a sign of kindness, ease, success, passing difficult experiences, and solving complex problems. Seeing a mother indicates the need for divine focus He is completely devoted to his mother, taking care of her, supervising her affairs, and meeting her needs. A mother’s smile in a dream is good news for the dreamer to accept invitations, improve the situation, reach the goal and change the scales. In distress. The vision is undesirable, or it spreads bad news to the monarch. If he sees that his mother is giving birth to him as if she is afflicted with a disease, this indicates the approach of menstruation and the end of life. Ibn Sirin confirms by saying that seeing the mother angry or unwilling to see the fortuneteller in the dream.

title: Interpretation of the dream of buying a car in a dream, complete correct interpretations

preview.html: What is the interpretation of buying a car in a dream? A question asked by many who have seen this dream. Seeing a car in a dream is a common and strange vision for dreamers, and interpretations of this dream vary between driving, driving, and buying, in addition to the fact that it differs between men and women. In general, these interpretations are closely related to the dreamer’s life in the present or near future. The vision may be promising for him and show goodness or warn him of the emergence of a major problem for him. Dreams may express what is happening inside him and the happiness or sadness he feels. Dreams are like Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir’s interpretation of the dream of buying a car, which you will find in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision as a sign of the coming of comfort and happiness for him and the end of worries, and if he is already married, then this vision shows marital happiness. As for the meaning of this vision for a single person, it indicates his marriage to a girl with good morals. In the case of driving a car, this vision indicates The dreamer is going through some changes in his life, and this vision may indicate that he will have the opportunity to travel. Interpretation of Ibn Katheer, who sees buying a car in a dream. Ibn Katheer mentioned that this vision is one of the dreamer’s praiseworthy dreams, indicative of kindness and livelihood, in dwelling in a new house. If the car is sold, this vision is repulsive to the dreamer and indicates that he will not achieve what he wants in reality. As for driving a car in a dream, this vision indicates a change in circumstances and a change for the better. Interpretation of a dream about buying a black car in a dream If the color of the car is black in a dream, then this The vision indicates the approaching deception and the removal of the worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from in reality. Seeing yourself buying a black car in a dream also indicates achieving the goals and aspirations that the dreamer seeks in reality, and it is also an indication of lawful living. If the dreamer sees that he is buying a black car In a dream with a large sum, this vision indicates that the dreamer will have a great job in the future, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of buying a jeep: In the case of buying a jeep, this vision indicates goodness and abundance, and it also indicates the psychological comfort that the dreamer enjoys in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is buying a Jeep in a dream and examining it from the inside, this is a sign of his generous morals that he has in reality. Seeing himself sitting inside a Jeep in a dream indicates that the dreamer has many morals, and this vision indicates stable relationships in the owner’s life. The dream. The Jeep is one of the most famous types of luxury cars, and we have mentioned before that seeing buying a luxury car in a dream portends the dreamer many good things that he will acquire in the near future. Interpretation of the dream of buying a car for single women: Seeing a car in general in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of Kindness and livelihood for her, and indicates her marriage to a man with noble morals. If she buys an old car in a dream, this vision indicates her marriage to a young man of good standing.

title: Interpretation of wheat in a dream

preview.html: If in your dreams you see vast wheat fields, it means that your interests will receive encouraging signs. If the wheat is ripe, this is confirmation of your luck and your love will be your happy companion. In bags or barrels, your determination to reach the pinnacle of success will be crowned with victory and the foundations of your love relationships will be consolidated. While you accumulate wealth, do not forget to protect your rights, and you will see your interests diminish from the hands of enemies. If you rub an ear from his head in your hands and eat it, you will work hard for success and gain and be assured of your rights. This indicates that you will enjoy great success and therefore you will be able to distinguish yourself in anything. The profession you choose. Wheat in a dream indicates lawful money that entails problems and difficulties. Buying wheat and planting it in a dream. Buying wheat in a dream means earning money and raising children, and growing wheat in the interpretation indicates work in which God Almighty’s satisfaction and the effort in growing it indicate the viewer’s keenness. To gain his satisfaction. Lord through loyalty, charity, and goodness. If the sleeper sees that he is planting wheat and growing barley, then he shows people the best of what he hides. Interpretation of an ear of wheat in a dream: A green ear of wheat or wheat indicates in a dream a fruitful year full of success and achievement, and a dry ear indicates a barren year or Qahfa, and this expression was mentioned in the story of Joseph, peace be upon him. But if he saw that he was collecting ears of corn with his hands or saw them in a threshing floor or a vessel, then he would eat from someone else’s income or he might have acquired knowledge and understanding. In this context, it was narrated on the authority of Hamadan that he had dinner and dreamed that he sold wheat and bought barley in return. One of the dream interpreters narrated what he saw, and he replied: Perhaps you can replace reciting the Qur’an or memorizing it with reading poetry. Ibn Sirin also said: Whoever sees in his dream that he is collecting ears of corn from a field or planting, knowing its owner, then he will be affected by the money scattered. It was green, so there is no harm from that. The meaning of wheat in a dream of a married man and woman. Wheat on a married woman’s bed indicates her pregnancy. It is said in the interpretation: Whoever dreams of planting a plant and marrying it, his wife will become pregnant, and in exile God knows best. Planting wheat in a dreamWhoever sees in a dream that he is planting a seed Barley, wheat, or wheat, then a good cause or a useful deed awakens him, so understand this. If he dreams that the one who planted it has grown up and has a need or whatever he intends to do, then the effort will be accepted, God willing. Interpretation of eating wheat in a dreamAnd as for the one who sees in his dream that he has eaten Dry or cooked wheat, he fears that something bad will happen to him. The ancient Arabs said: He who sows goodness reaps happiness, and he who sows evil reaps sadness. The poet said: If you do not sow and see a reaper, you will regret that you missed the time for sowing. As for whoever saw in his dream that he had eaten green wheat Tender, then, God willing, he will be a good servant, and perhaps the dream indicates piety and faith. Wheat in a dream If he dreams that he has a field in which there are ears of wheat or wheat, then his work in this world was good, and his effort is justified, and his punishment, God willing, is worthy of praise. Wheat flour in Wheat flour in a dream indicates a sum of money, or indicates children, and its best interpretation is for a married man and woman.

title: Interpretation of seeing dead people gives a married woman coins

preview.html: In this article from gptafser.com/ we will learn about the interpretation of this vision from the point of view of some commentators. Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving coins in a dream to a single girl: Seeing a single girl in her dream that a dead person is giving her coins, and she knew this person. The vision indicates Her multiple goals that she seeks and that she will achieve. The vision also indicates the abundant good that this girl will receive as a result of the goals that she has achieved. In the event that an unmarried girl sees paper money, this money has also spread widely in her home. Good news for her and her diet Broad, and that she has a relationship with a very rich and successful young man in her life. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is taking coins from her deceased father. Good news for her that she will get married soon and that her husband will have good morals and qualifications. When the unmarried girl saw the coins, those coins were made Of silver. Proof that this girl is very rich, and that she has a lot of money, silver and gold. An unmarried girl saw that she would go with a dead man and give him money, so she was sick and had an unpleasant vision. As this girl’s death soon shows, due to her illness, God is also The Most High and Knowledge. When the unmarried girl saw that he was taking coins and bills from her father while he was alive. The vision indicated that she felt safe in the presence of her father and that he would protect her from all harm. See also: Interpretation of dreams about collecting coins from dirt. Interpretation of seeing dead people giving coins In a dream of a married womanWhen a married woman sees in her dream that a dead man is giving her money. The vision shows that this woman really needs this money and that it came at the right time. When a married woman sees in her dream that a dead man is giving her money, he also knew him. The vision indicates The good that this woman enjoys, such as contentment and contentment. If a married woman sees silver money in her dream. The vision shows that this woman is pregnant and that she will give birth to a girl. But if she sees that the money is gold, then it is good for her to give birth to a boy. When a married woman sees in her dream Her husband gives her a lot of money even though he is dead. The vision showed that she overcame all the problems and difficulties she faced in her life. If a married woman sees a lot of bills in her dream and they fill her bag. The vision indicates that this woman will enjoy wide prosperity and abundant livelihood, God willing. The vision means Also that her husband will get a promotion in his job. When a married woman sees in her dream that someone she does not know is giving her money, but this money was old. The vision indicated that there were problems related to her past life, but she quickly overcame them. Interpretation of seeing a dead man giving a man in a dream Coins and their meaning: Seeing a man in his dream that he is taking money from a dead person has many meanings and connotations: When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is receiving money from a dead person he knows. Good news for the king of the abundance of food and the abundance of goodness that he must obtain. When the dreamer sees in his dream that his pocket is money.

title: The interpretation of seeing the president in a dream and talking to him is the most accurate interpretation according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Seeing the president in a dream and talking to him. The interpretation of seeing the president in a dream and talking to him has many meanings that vary according to the dreamer’s condition and circumstances, and whether he is a single man or girl, a married mother, pregnant or divorced. Ibn Sirin’s opinion on seeing the president in a dream in general. Location of the presentation. Differences in interpretation of seeing the president in a dream And talking to him is analyzed in the following points: It is one of the good and promising visions for the dreamer, because it generally indicates a change in his condition for the better. It indicates the good news that will soon come to the divine, which will bring joy and happiness to his heart and home. It also indicates tolerance and forgiveness for something that is bothering you. It is It indicates the expansion of his livelihood and the rise of his status and work. If you see that the president has grown old, this is an indication that time is running out with you and that your circumstances have not improved. Ibn Shaheen’s opinion is that people see the president in their dreams. Seeing the president in a dream shows things that you do not want and do not want to forgive This vision indicates the fulfillment of desires and reaching a high position. It also means peace and tranquility. If you see the president falling from the car he is riding, this vision indicates that he will lose his presidential position and power will go to another person. If the dreamer sees that he is in conflict with the president, this means that : He has a need with the president and he will fulfill it by God’s will. But if reconciliation is achieved between them, this indicates a failure to achieve what the dreamer wants. What does seeing the president in a dream mean for a man? Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream and talking to him is because the person is happy for him, that something important will happen soon in his life that will bring him happiness and prosperity. The interpretation of seeing the president in a dream smiling at the man is good news for him that he will assume an important position in his work, and from a religious standpoint, this vision indicates his good deeds and his closeness to God. The interpretation of seeing the president in a dream being angry with the dreamer. This vision is a warning of his shortcomings in worship. Or perhaps you are approaching problems with him at work. If a man sees that he is kissing his boss’s hand in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer is trying to attract his boss to facilitate his work. Interpretation of seeing the boss in a dream waving his hand to the major, this vision indicates a future period for the major full of happiness And success. If the fortuneteller is still a student and sees the president smiling in his sleep or in any situation, this is a good omen for him of success and excellence. Being single and the meaning of seeing the president in a dreamFor an unmarried girl, this vision indicates that someone of high status and people’s respect will He marries her. The interpretation of seeing the boss smiling at an unmarried girl in a dream indicates that she is good at work and in her religious affairs and will live a happy period. The interpretation of seeing the boss angry with an unmarried girl in a dream, may indicate her father’s anger, or that I am protecting her from her, or her negligence in Worship, especially in prayer. Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream extending his hand to an unmarried girl. This vision indicates a marriage proposal from a person in a high position that she will accept and be happy with. If a single girl sees herself kissing the president’s hand in the dream

If you see that the president has grown old, this is an indication that time is running out with you and that your circumstances have not improved. Ibn Shaheen’s opinion is that people see the president in their dreams. Seeing the president in a dream shows things that you do not want and do not want to forgive This vision indicates the fulfillment of desires and reaching a high position. It also means peace and tranquility. If you see the president falling from the car he is riding, this vision indicates that he will lose his presidential position and power will go to another person. If the dreamer sees that he is in conflict with the president, this means that : He has a need with the president and he will fulfill it by God’s will. But if reconciliation is achieved between them, this indicates a failure to achieve what the dreamer wants. What does seeing the president in a dream mean for a man? Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream and talking to him is because the person is happy for him, that something important will happen soon in his life that will bring him happiness and prosperity. The interpretation of seeing the president in a dream smiling at the man is good news for him that he will assume an important position in his work, and from a religious standpoint, this vision indicates his good deeds and his closeness to God. The interpretation of seeing the president in a dream being angry with the dreamer. This vision is a warning of his shortcomings in worship. Or perhaps you are approaching problems with him at work. If a man sees that he is kissing his boss’s hand in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer is trying to attract his boss to facilitate his work. Interpretation of seeing the boss in a dream waving his hand to the major, this vision indicates a future period for the major full of happiness And success. If the fortuneteller is still a student and sees the president smiling in his sleep or in any situation, this is a good omen for him of success and excellence. Being single and the meaning of seeing the president in a dreamFor an unmarried girl, this vision indicates that someone of high status and people’s respect will He marries her. The interpretation of seeing the boss smiling at an unmarried girl in a dream indicates that she is good at work and in her religious affairs and will live a happy period. The interpretation of seeing the boss angry with an unmarried girl in a dream, may indicate her father’s anger, or that I am protecting her from her, or her negligence in Worship, especially in prayer. Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream extending his hand to an unmarried girl. This vision indicates a marriage proposal from a person in a high position that she will accept and be happy with. If a single girl sees herself kissing the president’s hand in the dream
